body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:mod="http://sprintr.com/modeler">
   <soapenv:Header>
      <mod:authentication>
         <username>{{ModelerUsername}}</username>
         <password>{{ModelerPassword}}</password>
      </mod:authentication>
   </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <mod:CreateNewProjectV3>
         <Password>{{UserPassword}}</Password>
         <Username>{{UserUsername}}</Username>
         <Name>New Project</Name>
         <Summary>This is a new test project.</Summary>
         <ModelerVersion>7.0.0</ModelerVersion>
      </mod:CreateNewProjectV3>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

exec: tests["Faultstring states Login failed"] = res.faultstring === "Invalid credentials"
